revised_title: Thermodynamic Properties of Non-Spherical Molecule Solutions
tldr: The authors extend the turbation treatment of orientational forces between non-spherical molecules to mixtures using the theory of solutions proposed by Longuet-Higgins. They express the thermodynamic functions and equation of state of these mixtures in terms of intermolecular forces and properties of one pure component. The study compares the derived excess thermodynamic functions with experimental results on various solutions, improving the agreement by considering orientational forces.
